1172490.name: Lost Technology - Donation Soundtrack
1172490.description:
*NOTE*

This DLC is solely for the purpose of donations. It will not affect the game.

If you like the game and want to play the rest of the untranslated chapters, please support the developer by purchasing this DLC.

This product contains three additional soundtrack tracks which are not included in the main game.

Little Hints
  • If you want to listen to the original music, you can find the media files in the "BGM" folder of the game.
  • If you replace the original BGM with the new songs (or any other songs) and edit the file names, you can play the game with the different background music.
